title: Mantra Takiang Kaeo
overview: A charming lamp is a precious object which belongs to Tahira but suddenly disappears from her castle. Meanwhile, Evelyn, a black witch who had been captured and detained in a cave as punishment, was able to break free and take her revenge on Tahira. In the quest to find the precious lamp, Will, a handsome wizard, volunteers to go on this mission and comes across Reny, a beautiful and poor woman with an extraordinary gift who has never known her mother. Will suspects Reny may have something to do with the missing lamp.
